content.prompt: Which feature of the poem best supports an interpretation that the speaker finds mundane things to be appealing and engaging?

choices.label: The acknowledgment of the friendliness of the cafeâ€™s customers
The description of the contents of the shop window

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
